title: An Act further regulating business practices between motor vehicle dealers, manufacturers, and distributors

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Crighton, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 201) of Brendan P. Crighton for legislation to further regulate business practices between motor vehicle dealers, manufacturers, and distributors.  Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure

related_entities.name: committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/14/2025 from 10:00 AM-01:00 PM in A-2

Hearing rescheduled to 10/14/2025 from 10:00 AM-11:30 AM in A-2                                                                                                                                                            and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Reporting date extended to Thursday March 5, 2026
